title: Heera aur Manikyam: Timeless Polki Earrings
materials: Freshwater Pearls. Features traditional Hyderabadi Kundan setting.
features: Exquisite Chandbali style earrings featuring a floral motif top adorned with uncut Polki diamonds and a central ruby. The main body showcases a semi-circular design also encrusted with Polki diamonds, with a hanging emerald at the center. Lower pendants consist of rubies and pearls in a cluster design, creating a mesmerizing cascade. The setting is inspired by traditional Kundan artistry, showcasing impeccable attention to detail.
colors: Creamy White (Pearls). A classic South Indian color palette.
occasions: and festive occasions (panduga). Also suitable for elegant evening events where a touch of tradition is desired.
description: These earrings represent the pinnacle of South Indian jewelry craftsmanship. The use of uncut Polki diamonds provides a unique sparkle and adds to the vintage charm. The combination of rubies, emeralds, and pearls symbolizes prosperity and good fortune, making this piece an auspicious addition to any jewelry collection. Handcrafted by skilled artisans from Hyderabad.
